captions.text: Whaaaaaaaaaat!

We are going to be in a movie together!
I know!  It's gonna be awesome!

I have so many questions.
Yeah me too. 
Do you think there will be a cafe?

I doubt it.  
What's the premise?
I'm not sure.
They're making everyone believe its a versus movie.

Versus?  Like who would win in a fight?
That's weird.

What are they gonna call it? 
Well there's only one thing you can call it I say.
The Dark Knight Rises, again, and then beats up Superman.

Whatever!  
Sounds like the appropriate title to me.  Come on!

Let's be honest if that's how we're
naming this movie then we should name it...

Man of Steel the punch from space that
exploded batman's internal organs

dot dot dot or did it?  
NO WAY!

I could wipe you out like a meteor to
some dinosaurs.  
Oh please!

I survived an atom bomb.  
You mean you tricked everyone into thinking you were in the atom bomb.
Dude you got stabbed by your lady friend when she was right next to you.

you punchd the Joker over and over again
and all he did was laugh.
Bane broke your back! You didn't even defeat him, that was Catwoman technically.

and Alfred even saved you from your own
burning house one time
Yep.  I went through all of that and I'm still standing.
Just call it Man of Steel total pwnage

or because he's batman. 
(sigh)
Your ultimate get out of jail free card

Dude I would end you!
No way.  You're too much of a boyscout.

I'd have the upper hand easy.
Boy Scout huh!  That's a funny comparison

Boy scouts are always prepared sounds
like a certain persons utility belt I know of.
Oh I'll have all sorts of tricks up my sleeve

You'll never see me coming.
Okay Mandarin.  Why don't you lose the gadgets,

take off the gloves, and punch me in the
face and see if I even blink.

You sure you want a bat brusing? 
Oh there will be no bruising.  
Oh yes there will.

A Bat-breeze maybe. 
Here it comes.  Are you ready?  
I'm ready.
You sure you want this?

No dude I'm not scared. 
You sure?
Yeah.
Alright.  Here goes!

I'm waiting.
....
 Man of Steel...
was not inspiring.
now that's just hurtful.  You blinked!
Peace I'm out, I'm batman!

comments.text:
ok ok ok lets get this out of the way Yes Superman can beat Batman in a 
fight(no morals, no preptime, just a straight up DeathBattle).
In Reality No Superman is not going to actually win the fight because he 
always hold back and cant do what need to be done in the end. Yes Batman 
does have Kryptonite, but this is when Batman and Superman first meet so 
chances are he wont have them on him. Whats going to end up happening is 
its going to be a draw between them and/or someone going to break them up 
before the fight is settle. Sometime I don't understand what the debt is 
all about anyone should be able to figure out whats really going to happen 
in the movie, or if there was an actually death battle just comparing there 
stats (again no moral, just going all out doing what you have to do to kill 
the other hero). I personal don't like putting hero's against each other 
that's what the villains are for.

Great video Always love the bromance that these guy have in Super Cafe!﻿

comments.author: FloppyFlapjak

comments.text:
Batman is the best superheroes in my humble opinion but there is no way 
Batman will ever win against well, a god-like creature like Superman 
realistically. I'm no comic reader but i'm pretty sure that everytime 
Batman 'win' in a battle against Superman, he have the upper hand. Mostly 
Superman is under villain or some substance's control that render down most 
of his abilities.

in an ideal fight, both in tip top condition, Superman will encounter every 
attack from Batman even with all of his gameplan ready and 
cryptonite-powered gadget available on his utility belt. Lets forget the 
comic universe and see Batman's options on this fight:

Batman use fear to intimidate his opponents but how can you scared a being 
that almost never lose in a battle? Darkness won't help him while bat sonar 
will only make Superman laugh
We already know that any physical attack from Batman will be only a 
'breeze' for Superman so we can eliminate Batman's taijutsu and other 
martial arts he mastered, even with his powered fist it will have no effect 
on Superman. Close quarter combat will be the end for The Dark Knight
Batman have ninja-like abilities to hide his presence but Superman can see 
through everything, Batman can't do surprised attack, and even if he find 
an opportunity and flank Superman, the guy will just move as fast as light 
and encounter Batman with one fatal fist. And one other thing, Superman can 
easily destroy any hiding or cover place for Batman, he can level the whole 
fighting ground to make it harder for Batman to hide.
Batman have range weapons to hit Superman from safe place but Superman also 
have this. With his laser Superman can melt Batman with ease and he doesn't 
have to reload it and it have unlimited 'ammo'
Let's go all out, Batman use all of his arsenal including Batplane, 
Batmobile, The Tumbler, Batpod, and other awesome vehicles he possessed and 
have all of them fight Superman...we can see how this is gonna end right? 
Super fast move, super blow, super punch, super kick, super strength, super 
laser eye, ect.
Last important thing, Superman and Batman are friends and they know each 
other so much. It's logical for Superman to never, ever underestimate 
someone like Batman so he will never overconfidence, he will never do that 
'yeah-go-ahead-shoot-me-and-see-how-it-will-affect-me' attitude against 
Batman. Superman also know that Batman knew and possessed his weaknesses 
and will use it against him so he won't let any bullet, smoke bomb, 
batarang or any form of Batman's range attack touch him. Batman might be 
smart but you can't underestimate Superman either. He don't become the 
leader of Justice League and last this long just because he have brute 
force.

Verdict, in an ideal condition, Batman have no opportunity to win. All of 
his 'superpowers' will be nothing against Superman. We all love underdog 
story, we like David to outsmart Goliath, we like Leonidas's 300 taunt 
Xerxes, we like Iron Man go head to head with Captain America, that's why 
Batman will mostly win against Superman in any form of storytelling, but in 
a realistic world with both in peak condition (both mental and physical), 
Batman will never ever challenge The Man of Steel, he's too smart to 
exercise in futility.

Anyway, great and entertaining video!﻿

comments.text:
+Raximus3000 Last i checked, DC made the first superhero film with Captain 
Marvel, as well as the first successful superhero film with Superman, and 
while Marvel was trying to scrape away Spider-man 3, DC revolutionized 
cbm's with The Dark Knight. Before 2011 what was The Avengers? A batman rip 
off no one knew about till 2008, a green behemoth that had two bad films 
before, a civil war vet 90% of the other people thought was a guy with a 
shield, a long-haired norse god who is still questionable as a superhero, a 
Russian assassin who should be in jail rather than on the front lines to 
save the world, and a guy with arrows. You talk like DC doesn't have a plan 
on its own when starting March of 2016 we get two films going in an 
entirely different direction than Marvel. Just saying, you should probably 
research your stuff before using strong terms like 'ended the era of 
superhero movies'.
